title: Carleson measure and balayage
abstract: The balayage of a Carleson measure lies of course in the space of functions of bounded mean oscillation (BMO). We show that the converse statement is false. We also make a two-sided estimate of the Carleson norm of a positive measure in terms of certain balayages
